subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dan Duquette of the Baltimore Orioles, Neal Huntington of the Pittsburgh Pirates and Ben Cherington of the Boston Red Sox credit their former coach at Amherst College, Bill Thurston, for their success.
snippet: Dan Duquette of the Baltimore Orioles, Neal Huntington of the Pittsburgh Pirates and Ben Cherington of the Boston Red Sox credit their former coach at Amherst College, Bill Thurston, for their success.
